Sale Pending...

Hi all...selling a very nice N162 Anson graded VG+ (3.5) by PSA.  The registration and colors are dead-on and there are no creases/wrinkles.  There is light surface wear on the back (see the Foot Ball section on the image). This is a nice, very respectable card.  

I'm asking $xxxx which includes shipping and insurance.  Please PM me or send an email to mikewms4ATgmail.com with any questions or image requests.

Thanks for your time,

Mike
